name: Pirates of Rectangular
description:
"Shapes are what our world is made of"

The Shape Alliance is seeking brave sailors to combat the rebellious Pirates of Rectangular.
Can you restore order to the geometric world and end the conflict?

Navigate Your Ship!



A true captain always has the ship under control!
Dodge obstacles and skillfully navigate around your enemies.

Utilize Your Weapons!



Use the available cannons and rockets to fight against the pirates.
Sometimes, it takes more than just words for others to understand you.

Don't Let Them Board!



Cannonballs are scarce for the pirates,
so they'll try to ram your ship and board it!

Keep an Eye on Your Surroundings!



There are things you'd better avoid!
That includes leaking oil barrels that restrict your ship's movement.


What are you waiting for? Show us who the one true captain is!
Join the fight against the Rectangulars and lead the Shape Alliance to victory!
